title: Remember When?
content: Just reminiscing about some of the crazy adventures we've had together. Those memories always bring a smile to my face.

title: Thinking of You
content: Life's been hectic lately, but you've been on my mind. Hope you're doing well and staying positive!

title: Big News!
content: Something exciting is happening in my life, but I can't spill the beans just yet. Can't wait to share the details with you soon!

title: Feeling Grateful
content: Today, I'm counting my blessings, and you're definitely one of them. Thanks for being an amazing friend!

title: Just Because
content: No special occasion, just wanted to drop you a message to say hi and let you know you're appreciated.
